name: Somango
description: Somango from Soma Seeds is a 75% indica strain bred by crossing Jack Herer, Super Skunk, and Big Skunk Korean. Formerly known as Soma #5, Somango was later renamed after its fruity mango aroma. Despite its heavy indica genetics, Somangoâ€™s effects are uplifting and cerebrally-focused. Creative minds will enjoy the clear-headed and functional euphoria brought about by Somango, allowing focus and productivity. Soma recommends cultivating Somango in indoor soil gardens with organic nutrients, and with a 9 to 10 week flowering time.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Uplifted, Focused, Sleepy, Pain, Stress, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Depression, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Headache, Dizzy, Paranoid
